name: Stress and strain analysis of rocks
body:
###Teaching Materials for course "Stress and strain analysis of rocks" (Structural geology II)

  - [NTB - Python crash course](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/ondrolexa/sg2/blob/master/00_Python_Crash_Course.ipynb)
  - [NTB - Scientific Python - Numpy](http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/ondrolexa/sg2/blob/master/01_Scientific_Python_numpy.ipynb)
  - [NTB - Scientific Python - Matplotlib](http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/ondrolexa/sg2/blob/master/02_Scientific_Python_matplotlib.ipynb)
  - [PDF - Quantitative approach to strain modelling](https://github.com/ondrolexa/sg2/raw/master/pdfs/strain_modelling_part1.pdf)
  - [NTB - Introduction to strain analysis](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/ondrolexa/sg2/blob/master/10_Introduction_to_strain_analysis.ipynb)
  - [NTB - Strain ellipse](http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/ondrolexa/sg2/blob/master/11_Strain_ellipse.ipynb)
  - [PDF - Polar decomposition and deformation tensors](https://github.com/ondrolexa/sg2/raw/master/pdfs/strain_modelling_part2.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
